mapper.select: select va.*,ai.name ai_name,gi.name gi_name,gi.url from view_appointment va left join apartment_info ai on va.apartment_id=ai.id and ai.is_deleted=0 left join graph_info gi on va.apartment_id=gi.item_id and item_type=2 and gi.is_deleted=0 where va.is_deleted=0;

select va.id va_id,va.user_id,va.name va_name,va.phone va_phone,va.apartment_id va_apartment_id, va.appointment_time,va.additional_info,va.appointment_status,ai.*,min(ri.rent) rent, li.id li_id,li.type li_type,li.name li_name, gi.id gi_id,gi.name gi_name,gi.url from view_appointment va left join apartment_info ai on va.apartment_id=ai.id and ai.is_deleted=0 left join room_info ri on va.apartment_id=ri.apartment_id and ri.is_deleted=0 left join apartment_label al on va.apartment_id=al.apartment_id and al.is_deleted=0 left join label_info li on al.label_id=li.id and li.type=1 and li.is_deleted=0 left join graph_info gi on va.apartment_id=gi.item_id and gi.item_type=2 and gi.is_deleted=0 where va.id=#{id} and va.is_deleted=0;
